    Home

    WELCOME

    You guessed it, this site is under development (2021-02-05) —

    What this is

    A list of Swiss groups and facilities working with bioimage analysis

    News about training schools, conferences, and network events

    Links to relevant resources

    What this is not

    A place to ask questions about image analysis - use the forum for that

    A site dealing with microscopy

    KNOWLEDGE EXCHANGE MEETINGS

    FACILITIES AND GROUPS

    involved in consultations, project work, training, teaching, research

    ZHAW

    RESOURCES

    Annotated and curated list of links to forums, repositories for training material, etc

    • image.sc: Questions and answers in bioimage analysis using open-source software
    • Qupath: Open-source software platform for whole slide image analysis.
    • NEUBIAS Academy: YouTube videos teaching tools and concepts
    • BIAflows: A BioImage Analysis workflows benchmarking platform
    • Biii: BioImage Informatics Index - annotated list of software, modules, and workflows
